                                         int y,
                                         model.User userLogin,
                                         int pageRead)
        Simulates a reading session for a specific product in a user's library.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the product in the library.
        y - The y-coordinate of the product in the library.
        userLogin - The user who is logged in.
        pageRead - The number of pages to be read in the current session.
        Returns:
        A string representing the reading session information.

      • cancelSubscription

        public java.lang.String cancelSubscription​(model.User user,
                                           int x,
                                           int y)
        Cancels a subscription for a user at the specified position in their library.
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose subscription is being canceled.
        x - The row position of the magazine in the user's library.
        y - The column position of the magazine in the user's library.
        Returns:
        A message indicating the result of the cancellation.
